item.title: Advanced Customisation
item.description: There are a couple of ways you can make style changes to Congo. If you just need to add or override some simple styles, you can do so by creating a custom.css file in your project’s static/css/ folder. This file will be loaded automatically after the theme’s default styles. Alternatively, if you’d like to make a major change, you can take advantage of Tailwind CSS’s JIT compiler and rebuild the entire theme CSS from scratch.
